title: You Were Meant for Me
description: Misery loves company...Emily has loved Chris. Since second grade. He loves knowing he can count on Emily, his best pal, for TLC when love goes wrong.David has loved Liza. Since third grade. She loves knowing she can always depend on her best friend, David.Chris and Liza love each other.Emily and David meet at Chris and Liza's wedding. They have a lot in common. Pain. Loneliness. The ache of unrequited love. The absolute conviction that Chris and Liza are wrong for each other. And the absolute belief that true love will conquer all...maybe?
author: Elise Title
